attributes.action: increase employee job protection by commencing 'unfair dismissal' rights from 6 months employment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At the moment an employee with 11 months service with a company have significantly fewer employment protections than someone with 12 months with an employer. 

I propose reducing the point at which an employee is protected against unfair dismissal from 12 months to 6 months.
